message: Bob, I have a fantastic opportunity for you to acquire a product that I believe will be a valuable asset for your business. While I value this product at $1,200,000, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1,100,000.  This is a significant discount, and I'm confident that this product will bring you a return on your investment. Please let me know your decision. If you decline, I have another interested buyer ready to purchase it at full price.
